WorkItem.Description:
This began after updating to 1.0.9 I have a form with 5 RateIt Fields and always from the first one the yellow stars turn grey the moment I click into any textfield in the form and then press return. The Form is not submitted as it was with 1.0.9 I tried adding
as the first rating div, now this one turned grey. In firebug i saw aria-valuenow="5" to turn to "0" the moment I pressed return.
WorkItem.Summary: RateIt Stars disappear when clicking into another form field and pressing return

Comments.Message: That sounds strange. Could you give me a  link to the form you're talking about.  Or recreate the issue with a JSFiddle?

http://jsfiddle.net/V2Pyh/1/ or: ```
``` 1. pick stars in first div 2. pick stars in sec div 3. click into text field 4. press return =>selected stars in first div turn grey

Thanks for the jsFiddle, that helped a lot. 
The bug has been fixed.
